analyzed: bsam yul las 'das/_/de bzhin nyid dbyings ye shes te/_/de phyir dngos

analyzed: mthing dang dud kha dkar ser dang /_/dmar la dang bas brtan par bya/_/

translated: transforms into the celestial mansion:🔽the shape of the precious gnosis is square,🔽with a parapet and arched gateways.🔽The path is the four steps of the path.🔽The result is the four kāyas.

analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba 'od kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba/

analyzed: bsgrod phyir rta babs brgyad/_/de'i 'bras bu brgyad rdzogs phyir/_/sna 'phyong

analyzed: rin chen za ra tshhags/_/chu skyes rta rkang sgrom bu dang /_/sgril 'chang shar spu

analyzed: khyung mgo sogs/_/dbyibs dang kha dog mdzes par ldan/_/tha snyad rang rig

analyzed: sems snang phyir/_/rtshe mo rma bya'i mdongs lta bus/_/ji ltar bltas pa de ltar

analyzed: snang /_/kun tu snyoms phyir byar 'dabs ldan/_/seng mgo kha nas mu tig 'phro//

analyzed: pha gu dra ba dra phyed dang /_/gzugs kyi lha mo rnam par spras/_/gzhan yang rgyan

analyzed: rnam par brgyan/_/khri rkang brgyad ldan de bar du/_/seng ge brgyad kyis rnam

analyzed: par spras/_/de steng rin chen pad+ma dang /_/nyi zla gnyis te lnga yis brgyan/_/

analyzed: pa/_/yum dang yab du 'dra ba las/_/g.yas pas yab khyud g.yon dril bu/_/

analyzed: sku ru bstan pa rnam par bsam/_/hum dang dza dang ho du las/_/rtshibs bzhi

analyzed: thugs su bdag sbyor cig_/bskul bas 'od 'phros gnas gsum sbyangs/_/

analyzed: dzas bskul rdo rjer bzhengs/_/phyogs bsdus dkyil 'khor bdag nyid che/_/

analyzed: phyogs dus kun nas gshegs pa'i/_/bsnyen pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu rdzogs/_/

analyzed: nye bar gyur pa'i dam tshhig mchog_/kye kye bcom ldan 'das kyis dgug_/dza hum

analyzed: byas/_/'di ni ye shes dkyil 'khor rnams/_/bstim pa yin zhes rnam par

analyzed: srin lag mthe bong chags pa che/_/mthe'u chung mthe bong legs pa mchog_/sgo

analyzed: bzhi khro bo'i phyag rgya ni/_/rim par bca' zhes yin par gsungs/_/dam rdzas

analyzed: lhag pa'i ting 'dzin dang /_/glu dang rol mo ye shes dang /_/sbyor sgrol tshhogs

analyzed: kyi mchod pa dang /_/dbang po yul 'dus rig pa kun/_/gnyis med rgyan gyi

analyzed: mchod pa ste/_/bsam dang brjod dang sprul byas te/_/lha la lha thim tshhul gyis
translated: Imagining, expressing, and emanating, the deity dissolves into the🔽deity, and with all of that

analyzed: dang /_/'di mi 'gal ba yin pa yis/_/gzhung du rnam par bkod pa yin/_/

analyzed: zhor 'byung bsgom rim lam bshad pa/_/dang po stong pa chen pos ste/_/cir

analyzed: yang mi dmigs rnam pa bsgom/_/sna tshhogs dmigs pa chen po 'di/_/mi spang

analyzed: de la rnam par rol/_/de la sgyu ma'i dpe brgyad ldan/_/kun la rnam par

analyzed: bsam par bya/_/de la hum du 'dris pa 'am/_/gang yang rung bar bsgoms pa
translated: One should meditate on that as a HUM or whatever is appropriate.

translated: From that, the visualization becomes stable, and one should meditate on the blazing vajra and bell.🔽From that, one should meditate on the maṇḍala of the deity holding the hand implements.

analyzed: bkod de gsal bar gyur pa dang /_/gong ma de las ma nyams par/_/de nyid

analyzed: yan lag spros bdag ste/_/dbang bskur byin rlabs yan lag lha/_/yab yum

analyzed: gnyis la de bzhin du/_/lhag ma la yang de bzhin sbyar/_/yang na dpag tshhad

analyzed: rgyang grags sam/_/nam mkha'i dbyings ni bsam yas par/_/sangs rgyas

analyzed: bsam pa bzhin du 'grub/_/tshhe ni bcu dang drug pa yis/_/brgya brgya dag tu

analyzed: ngan 'das/_/'di ni lhun grub rigs 'dzin pa'o/_/rgyun gyi thig le

analyzed: dbyings su'o/_/de las lha'i sku bskyed la/_/rtog tshhogs lha'i dkyil 'khor du//

analyzed: 'gro nyal 'dug sdod spyod lam bzhir/_/mi 'bral bsam pa rgyun du bya/_/'di
